description:
• Changed the last two beats in bar 32 and other indentical bars on "Kirk Hammett - Distortion Guitar" and "James Hetfield - Distortion Guitar" to quarter notes rather eighth notes with G power chords (which there shouldn't be)
• Changed the quarter notes in bar 192 on "Kirk Hammett - Distortion Guitar", "James Hetfield - Distortion Guitar" and "Cliff Burton - Electric Bass" to eighth notes with eighth note rests
title: Fight Fire With Fire

description:
Forgot to edit some things, here is a complete summary:

What is edited: James's and Kirk's distortion guitars, the intro and solo have not been touched.

- Added PM's
- 2 Finger chords changed to 3 finger chords except the main riff.
- Few chords changed.
- Fade in, fade out effects
- Up-picks added

Enjoy fellow guitar players with playing this fast and heavy track!
title: Fight Fire With Fire
